author: Doris Mortman
message: Until you make peace with who you are, you will never be content with what you have.
title: Thought of the day

author: Buddha
message: No one saves us but ourselves. No one can and no one may. We ourselves must walk the path.
title: Thought of the day

author: Henry Miller
message: The moment one gives close attention to anything, it becomes a mysterious, awesome, indescribably magnificent world in itself.
title: Thought of the day

author: Mohandas Gandhi
message: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.
title: Thought of the day
